column4: Hi - is it easy/possible to install ubuntu (server) from a remote computer....  Im about to purchase a server( for personal home use) and wanted to avoid having to purchase a CD drive in it.  I would connect to it via ethernet via my computer
ah ok ( except I dont want to have to be playing with HDD's)  Ill read through the usb section on that page - thanks!
if you can someway to boot into livecd enviroment, yes. using usb, boot over ethernet, etc..
